1: rten gsum po gcig gzhon lus//gnas brtan rgan po skyedgu'i bdag /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang pa //sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdges//slob dpon 'jig rtena yon tan shes//
2: 'jig rten slo ba dpon 'jigs pa med//mgon skyob 'jig rten gsum khyab pa//skyabs dang sgyob pa bla na med/ /nam mkha' khyab par longs skyod pa//thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes mtso//
3: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po // nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa//'khor ka'i rgya m/tsho'i pha rol son//ye shes dbang bskur chod pan can//yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs
4: rgyas rgyan//sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi//gsum mtha' mtha' yas grol gsum pa//srib pa thams cad nges par grol//mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas//nyon mongs dri ma kun
5: as 'das /dus gsum dus med rtogs par gnas//sems can kun gyi klu chen po //yon tan thod can rnams kyi thod//lhag ma kun las rnam grol ba//nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa//
6: yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang// khyab bdag rin cshan kun gyi mchog /dpag bsam shing chan rgyas pa ste // bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /byed bo sems can kun don byed//phan 'dogs sems
7: can mnyes gshin pa// bzang gan shes shing dus shes pa//khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan//dus shes sems can dbang bo shes//rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po//yon tan ldan
